thread.title: Tom Caudell
thread.title_full: Gardner-White Furniture reviewed by Tom Caudell

author: Tom Caudell
title: Tom Caudell
text: I had a positive experience with gardner white, there guys was fast and curtious and did a great job all around ! Now when i scheduled a late Appointment i didnt realize it would be at 10:45 at night , i would have thought 6-8 was late enough but all around was a good experience. Thank you
